Container.Name: convex-dashboard
Container.Overview: Convex self-hosted dashboard. Web UI for managing your Convex deployment. Accessible on port 6791. Requires the Convex Backend container to be running and healthy.
Container.Requires: Convex Backend container must be running first.

Config.Name: NEXT_PUBLIC_DEPLOYMENT_URL
Config.Description: URL of the Convex Backend API. Must match the backend's CONVEX_CLOUD_ORIGIN. Format: http://YOUR_UNRAID_IP:3210 (e.g. http://192.168.1.100:3210)
